ygData.subject: Suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi!  I am fairly new to the list and wanted to know if anyone had some suggestions for me on what songs make the best combos for juggling/twisting. I have
ygData.messageBody:
Hi! I am fairly new to the list and wanted to know if anyone had some
suggestions for me on what songs make the best combos for juggling/twisting.
I have several songs that I rarely if ever use because they always seem to
get me killed but have seen recent suggestions on mssg boards that said they
were quite good for use in fights and in duels as well. I was wondering
what others' experiences or suggestions were with any songs or combinations
there of.


Isabo Donjour
(Baby Bard)
TM Bard of 28th Circle
